医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
阿姆斯特丹联电主导的项目通过人工智能和自然语言处理推动医疗保健创新80% 的患者数据是非结构化的。来自与全科医生的谈话记录、大学医疗中心专家的评估，甚至是药剂师的推荐。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Amsterdam-UMC-led-project-drives-innovation-in-healthcare-with-AI-and-natural-language-processing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Amsterdam-UMC-led-project-drives-innovation-in-healthcare-with-AI-and-natural-language-processing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24f22793-7249-495d-baca-20d5047f9dfa Fri, 01 Sep 2023 15:38:04 -0400 Amsterdam UMC-led project drives innovation in healthcare with AI and natural language processing
拜登政府提出新标准以增加疗养院人员配备根据拜登政府周五提出的新规定，美国人员最稀少的疗养院将被要求雇用更多工人，这是三十年来联邦疗养院法规的最大变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Biden-administration-proposes-new-standards-to-boost-nursing-home-staffing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Biden-administration-proposes-new-standards-to-boost-nursing-home-staffing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dac077d5-78e3-4b17-89c7-bc2f4d10ba11 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 15:31:21 -0400 Biden administration proposes new standards to boost nursing home staffing
西地尼布和来那度胺的组合不能改善晚期甲状腺癌的预后由芝加哥大学医学综合癌症中心领导的一项多中心 II 期临床试验的结果表明，在靶向酪氨酸激酶抑制剂 (TKI) 西地尼布的治疗中添加免疫调节剂并未对晚期癌症患者的治疗结果产生影响由甲状腺滤泡细胞发展而来的甲状腺癌称为分化型甲状腺癌 (DTC)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Combination-of-cediranib-and-lenalidomide-does-not-improve-outcomes-in-advanced-甲状腺-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Combination-of-cediranib-and-lenalidomide-does-not-improve-outcomes-in-advanced-甲状腺-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c0cb02a-ea23-4e75-9fc0-fe9c8137710d Fri, 01 Sep 2023 15:29:29 -0400 Combination of cediranib and lenalidomide does not improve outcomes in advanced thyroid cancer
国际联盟研究 RSV 感染与慢性呼吸道疾病之间的联系UMC Utrecht 将领导一个国际联盟，该联盟将试图回答许多儿科医生、感染学家、肺科医生和其他卫生专业人员心中的一个关键问题：“为什么在幼儿期感染 RSV 的儿童以后患哮喘的风险会增加在生活中？” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/International-consortium-to-study-link- Between-RSV-infection-and-chronic-respiratory-tract-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/International-consortium-to-study-link- Between-RSV-infection-and-chronic-respiratory-tract-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4f7f035-83db-4888-a890-858b3935b948 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 15:23:28 -0400 International consortium to study link between RSV infection and chronic respiratory tract diseases
加权抽签有助于确保稀缺的 COVID-19 药物的公平分配一项旨在确保公平的计划，旨在为生活在美国最弱势社区的人们提供稀缺的、可能挽救生命的药物，事实证明在大型卫生系统中是可行的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Weighted-lottery-helps-ensure-equitable-allocation-of-scarce-COVID-19-medication.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Weighted-lottery-helps-ensure-equitable-allocation-of-scarce-COVID-19-medication.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e24013fe-9e68-4be9-ac31-33ac060c902e Fri, 01 Sep 2023 15:19:05 -0400 Weighted lottery helps ensure equitable allocation of scarce COVID-19 medication
小鼠研究有助于了解 DiNP 如何影响怀孕我们经常通过储存容器、医疗器械、包装、织物和玩具等塑料产品接触环境中的邻苯二甲酸盐。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Mice-study-helps-understand-how-DiNP-affects-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Mice-study-helps-understand-how-DiNP-affects-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08e34f84-a8e9-4777-84d9-86685f22f491 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 15:11:21 -0400 Mice study helps understand how DiNP affects pregnancy
富含硝酸盐的蔬菜饮食增强红细胞的心脏保护作用根据发表在《临床研究杂志》上的一项新的 KI 研究，暴露于缺氧状态的红细胞可以预防心肌梗塞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Heart-protective-effect-of-red-blood-cells-is-enhanced-by-硝酸盐-rich-vegetable-diet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Heart-protective-effect-of-red-blood-cells-is-enhanced-by-硝酸盐-rich-vegetable-diet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=224a1a41-2b24-4d7f-9351-e82263058a08 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 12:46:58 -0400 Heart protective effect of red blood cells is enhanced by nitrate-rich vegetable diet
研究称就业不稳定的人更容易过早死亡卡罗林斯卡学院在《流行病学与社区杂志》上发表的一项研究报告称，没有稳定工作合同的人如果获得永久就业，可以将过早死亡的风险降低 20%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/People-in-precarious-employment-more-likely-to-die-early-study-says.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/People-in-precarious-employment-more-likely-to-die-early-study-says.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=881671f3-8afa-41cb-99ae-2c550db49321 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 12:42:49 -0400
研究发现他汀类药物可以保护 IBD 患者免受结直肠癌的侵害降低胆固醇的他汀类药物可能会保护溃疡性结肠炎患者免于罹患结直肠癌和死于结直肠癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Statins-may-protect-IBD-病人-from-colorectal-cancer-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Statins-may-protect-IBD-患者-from-colorectal-cancer-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=566896bd-1780-43cf-ac4a-51fb611b308c Fri, 01 Sep 2023 12:41:45 -0400 Statins may protect IBD patients from colorectal cancer, study finds
制药工艺开发中的爆炸危险识别Scitegrity 是化学品监管合规领域的领先公司，很高兴地宣布扩大其针对制药工艺开发和安全团队的危险品评估器的版本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Explosive-Hazard-Identification-in-Pharmaceutical-Process-Development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Explosive-Hazard-Identification-in-Pharmaceutical-Process-Development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a2bf9ad-5b7d-4c5d-8acb-2aee1862130e Fri, 01 Sep 2023 10:47:00 -0400
